entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main character of the story, a powerful wizard who has lost his body.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: A group of followers of Voldemort, mentioned as being present in a circle listening to him.

entities.name: aurors
entities.description: A group of law enforcement officials who are searching for Voldemort.

entities.name: forest
entities.description: A place where the narrator settled and waited to be found by one of his Death Eaters.

relationships.description: Voldemort has followers, specifically mentioned as being present in a circle listening to him.
Voldemort knows that the Aurors are searching for him and therefore dares not go where they are plentiful.
The narrator settled in a faraway place, specifically mentioned as being in a forest.
Voldemort expects one of his faithful Death Eaters to come and perform magic to restore him to a body.
